Class SubjectGUIAbstract

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component

                • web.gui.secretary.spec.SubjectGUIAbstract
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AddSubject, EditSubject

    public abstract class SubjectGUIAbstract
extends GUIAbstract
    extended by AddSubject, EditSubject, and ViewSubject.
    Create common components, initialize them, and define a layout and design user interface.
    Author:
    maint
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • readyToSendRequest

        protected boolean readyToSendRequest()
        Check pre-condition to send request to server.
        Used in AddUser, EditUser when click button "Add" or "Save".
        Specified by:
        readyToSendRequest in class GUIAbstract
        Returns:
        true if:
      • full name field is valid.
      • user name field is valid.
      • and email field is valid.
        else false.

      • checkListEmails

        private boolean checkListEmails()
        Check validation list input email
        Returns:

        false if list input email of teacher is not valid
        false if list input email of student is not valid
        true if both are valid.

      • validListEmails

        private boolean validListEmails(long userTypeID)
        Valid input email of user
        Parameters:
        userTypeID -
        Returns:

        userTypeID = UserType.TEACHER Check list input emails of teachers, if there is any email which is not a teacher's email of system, return false;
        userTypeID = UserType.STUDENT Check list input emails of students, if there is any email which is not a student's email of system, return false;

      • getListEmailFromTextView

        private java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getListEmailFromTextView(long userTypeID)
        Get list email of user from textarea
        Parameters:
        userTypeID -
        Returns:

        userTypeID = UserType.TEACHER List email of teacher get from input of listTeacherView
        userTypeID = UserType.STUDENT List email of student get from input of listStudentView

      • getListEmailUsers

        private void getListEmailUsers(long userTypeID)
        Get list users' emails of subject from database:
        - userTypeID = UserType.TEACHER get list email of teacher
        - userTypeID = UserType.STUDENT get list email of student
        Parameters:
        userTypeID - is integer which represent for teacher or student.
